display_name: Functional Outcomes of Sleep Questionnaire (FOSQ): Global Score
description:
Summary score based on the sum of the subscale scores of the Functional Outcomes of Sleep Questionnaire, with potential range of 5 to 20 - mean of the subscales multiplied by five (5). A lower score suggests greater function impairment. [Weaver et. al, 1997 (Pubmed ID: 9415942)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/9415942)

[Search for all Functional Outcomes of Sleep variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/homepap/variables?search=fosq)
